archimate:Driver.name: Purpose
archimate:Driver.documentation: The overarching goal of a Governance Framework as defined by its Governance Authority and Trust Community. The Purpose of Sovrin Infrastructure as a global public utility is defined in section 1 of the Sovrin Governance Framework.
